title: List of all Android ocr  tesseract libraries for use in your project
meta: See collection of all Android ocr  tesseract libraries, filter by license, modified date, languages, and select best for your usecase.

repoList.name: Business-Card-Reader-BCR-
repoList.description: Android app to extract name, email and phone from business card using OCR library tess-two (Fork of Tesseract Tools for Android) and phone's camera.

repoList.name: OCR-Equation-Solver
repoList.description: Android app for solving mathematical equations using Tesseract OCR library and Wolfram API.

repoList.name: DroidTranslate
repoList.description: DroidTranslate is a Turkish-English translator for Android. It uses Tesseract Tools as an OCR library.

repoList.name: TesseractOCRforAndroidLib
repoList.description: *Required for OCRProject* - Library source build for Tesseract OCR for Android.

repoList.name: OCR_Android_Application
repoList.description: OCR android application using  Tesseract library.

repoList.name: Braille
repoList.description: Android app performing OCR using Tesseract Library.

repoList.name: android_calculate_restaurant_bills_app
repoList.description: This is an android application using the tesseract OCR library to compute the amount to pay from a restaurant bill with the tip included.

repoList.name: OCR-optical-char-recognition-scanner
repoList.description: OCR scanner is an android app based on character recognition and processing using tesseract library. Characters of many different languages can be processed, but for the prototype english language is given. Different languages can be included as per the requirement.

repoList.name: Business-Card-Reader-BCR-
repoList.description: Android app to extract name, email and phone from business card using OCR library tess-two (Fork of Tesseract Tools for Android) and phone's camera.

repoList.name: Traduire
repoList.description: Traduire is an OCR android application that recognizes text in images ( using Tesseract library) and translates the same into desired language.
